go_data.justification: IKKbeta is involved in the phosphorylation of the inhibitor of NF-kappaB (IkappaB).
IKKbeta phosphorylates IkappaB, leading to its degradation and the subsequent activation of NF-kappaB.
IKKbeta is involved in the phosphorylation of IkappaB in the cytoplasm, prior to NF-kappaB activation and nuclear translocation.
